TEXT: e1: No, the retirement age should be raised to 65 again.
e2: People are getting older on average,
CN RELATION: people, getting older (CapableOf)/people, older on average (HasProperty)

TEXT: e3: but they are not sicker and not duller because of it.
CN RELATION: people, sicker (NotHasProperty)/people, duller (NotHasProperty)/getting older, being sicker (NotCauses)/getting older, being duller (NotCauses)

TEXT: e4: Without them we'd forgo a great deal of collected experience.
e5: And we'd have to offer more leisure activities for seniors.
